title: Super Doctor - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Doctors   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Romantic Subplot   System Administrator
author: 叶天南
description:
Xu Ze, a junior in medical college, got a super medical assistant system from the future.

Now, a small otaku man who has no need but to work part-time outside to help his parents support his family has a new goal.

Relying on his own efforts and diligence, with the help of this system with unlimited auxiliary functions, Xu Ze strides forward with his head held high.

He bravely looked ahead and said loudly: as long as we work hard and have dreams.>
